questionSection.lavaggioAppDescription: We are launching a subscription service for car washing. It consists of two apps, one for the client and one for the partner, like Uber. Our main technology project for the Italian market.
questionSection.manualWashDescription: The home manual wash service was designed to offer convenience and quality. We use special techniques to ensure detailed cleaning of every part. We take care of pick-up and delivery, all without you having to leave home.
questionSection.downloadAndBookDescription: Download our app and book the service in a few clicks. Easily schedule your delivery.
questionSection.exclusiveAIForSectorTitle: Creating an exclusive AI for the sector
questionSection.exclusiveAIForSectorDescription: We are creating an exclusive AI for the washing sector, designed to accurately assess process quality and guarantee results for each treated item.
